thread.section_title: www.uberchild.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.uberchild.com | uberchild.com
thread.title: Zafar

author: Zafar
title: Zafar
text:
I'm US customer of them.
Recently bought the Uberchild EVO 3 in 1 Travel System.
Delivery:
* from Ireland, pretty fast (4 -5 days).
Support team:
* good, responsive.
Quality of the product:
* this is so far the best travel system I have found. 2017 model of Uberchild EVO is really good. The design is made really professionally by people who really understand the product and people needs.
Pricing is very reasonable for the set. The car seat has locking/fixation indicator - helps a lot. Easy to "plug". Stroller is really comfortable in a way that you can switch facing side. Aluminium made body frame.
To summarize - the overall quality and design is very good.
I would highly recommend their product as a complete set for newborn.
Personally want to thank you also for doing such product. Great work, keep up.
A suggestion would be for you to publish more pictures/videos so people will see all they need to know, the videos you had are not comprehensive.
PS:
The company really does not do marketing, but it is probably one of the real companies who focus on product rather then rubbish marketing.
